item.title: CVE-2024-23514|2024-02-10T08:16:22.534Z -- clicktotweet.com -- click%20to%20tweet
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ClickToTweet.Com Click To Tweet allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Click To Tweet: from n/a through 2.0.14.
